failed_number.query: select count(JobId) as failed_jobs from public.Job where JobErrors != 0 and JobStatus != 'A' and Name != 'RestoreFiles' and StartTime >= (now() - interval '1 day');

failed_names.label: jobs
failed_names.query: select name from public.Job where JobErrors != 0 and JobStatus != 'A' and Name != 'RestoreFiles' and StartTime >= (now() - interval '1 day');
